questions.question: Feature caching should always be enabled when running workspaces in production.
You can inspect multiple feature caches at once by CTRL (or CMD on Mac) clicking multiple caches.
For which scenario might you use Partial Runs?
options: You want to run your entire workspace and write the data out to view it in the destination application.
You want to test running your entire workspace with a different value of a Published Parameter.
You are running a workspace in production.
You just added a new transformer, set its parameters, and would now like to see if it transformed the data as you wished.

questions.question: Visual Preview can display multiple views of data like Data Inspector.
The Display Control, Graphics, Table, and Feature Information windows in Visual Preview replicate the behavior of those in Data Inspector.
